products.name: Calvet Limited Release Sauvignon blanc
products.desc: Fresh, zesty citrus and crushed leaves, rich texture with a crisp and refreshing finish

products.name: Château Haut Mouleyre
products.desc: Orchard fruit and peaches with a whiff of camomile. Quite textural and firm, with freshness and great affinity for spicy foods

products.name: Sec de Rayne Vigneau
products.desc: A concentrated and superbly elegant wine, honeyed and richly textured yet taut and dry with lingering flavour on the palate.

products.name: Château Liot 37.5cl
products.desc: Honeyed, with lemon curd and almond flavours, lovely sweetness offset by racy acidity. Youthful and elegant.
products.aromas: Almond, Quince, Mango, Pineapple, Peach, Dried apricot, Passion fruit
